title: The First Time In My Life

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Eh……Ku-chan-senpai is still taking a break? 
Weren't we supposed to go back to normal training today——
choice_data_list: Yeah, that was the plan, but——
Yeah, that was the plan, but——

text_block_list.text:
Today, when I happened to run in to her during lunch, she still 
seemed like she was tired. I was the one that told her to take a break.

Today, when I happened to run in to her during lunch, she still 
seemed like she was tired. I was the one that told her to take a break.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Right……well since the 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』, 
she's raced three consecutive months. If she takes 
some time to slowly recover, it should be fine.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Eh～, I guess so. ……Hm～～～……

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Well, right now Senpai's roommate is on a leave of absence right? 
Doesn't that mean she's alone in the dorms? ……Hmmmm～……

——This is today's menu. I've been adding a lot of stuff to prepare 
for the 『Oaks』 but……if you finish it, you can leave early, okay?

——This is today's menu. I've been adding a lot of stuff to prepare 
for the 『Oaks』 but……if you finish it, you can leave early, okay?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……! I'll do it! I'll do it all!! 
Don't underestimate a Genius!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: And then, I'll go visit Ku-chan-senpai～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Hnnngh, hnnngh, hnnngh, Hnnghnununununu……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Uuryaaaaaaaaaaーーーー!! 
…………Alright～! My best time!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: And so, Trainer!?
choice_data_list: Okay, okay. You're done for today!
Okay, okay. You're done for today!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Got it! 'preciate it!! 
See ya tomorrow～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Oh man～……to think she'd seriously be able to finish it all early. 
She really is amazing.

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kuuu～～～ As usual, for someone blessed with talent……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, I suppose that's true. 
……On the other hand, maybe something's begun to grow within her?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Huuーーーー……that's weird. 
Is it getting easier for me to get tired……?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Seeeeeenpaiiiiiーーーーー!! 
Hey hey hey heyーーーー☆

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Wah!? P-Pandora-san……!? 
Huh, what about training!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Done in an instant♪ So I came to visit! Now you won't be lonely, 
right? Lovely don't you think? Feelin' better already aren't you～!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……Anyways. No, seriously……Ku-chan-senpai, are you okay? 
That was the first time you were off the boards right?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
It's just that, well～……before your race, 
it felt like you were doing all kinds of things for me～……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Ah, don't worry about that! It's not Pandora-san's fault, 
you know? The race……yeah, I wasn't really able to focus at the start.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: On the other hand, since Pandora-san was together with me——

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
…………Nnaaaa～! I'm so frustrated!! 
I showed you something uncool～.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? No, that's not true! 
I never thought that, you know!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Because……because I saw it! I watched Senpai! 
Working hard everyday! Really～ hard……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……Fufu. Thank you, Pandora-san.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But, I still wanted to show you. 
Show you……even just a little, and hopefully encourage you.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Encourage……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah. ——For the 『Oaks』.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Instead of the 『Oaks』, I chose the 『NHK Mile C』. 
I don't regret it though.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But……I did admire the Triple Tiara stage. 
Winning the 『Oaks』 really was my dream at one point.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's why……well, but it is a little selfish of me though! 
We've been working hard together so, for Pandora-san's 『Oaks』——

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to do everything I could to cheer you on. 
……I messed up though, ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Ku-chan……senpai————

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (……will they sparkle again?)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (If I win. ……If I win the 『Oaks』)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Senpai's eyes. Will they……sparkle again——?)

(The next day, after training. ……Surprisingly, Fusaichi Pandora 
had stayed behind——and now she slowly came over to me)

(The next day, after training. ……Surprisingly, Fusaichi Pandora 
had stayed behind——and now she slowly came over to me)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ………… ——Um, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: To win the 『Oaks』……what else do I need to do?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh my. ……The girl that was saying 『I'm a Genius』 
『Winning is a given』 can ask that now?

——Of course, but there's still a lot to be done before then. 
We'll do this 『Seriously』. Fusaichi Pandora!

——Of course, but there's still a lot to be done before then. 
We'll do this 『Seriously』. Fusaichi Pandora!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah! Okay, I'll do it!!

First, I'm sure you've heard this many times, but your abilities…… 
Your potential is incredible. We need to take full advantage of that.

First, I'm sure you've heard this many times, but your abilities…… 
Your potential is incredible. We need to take full advantage of that.

On the other hand, it's fine to think that the reason you've 
lost up until now is because you weren't 『Able to give your 
fullest』. The important thing——is to 『Run until the end』

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Tenacious, huh～? Being gutsy～……So mental is important?

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Mental, guts……then it's gotta be that!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ——I'll say it now. I'm not as gentle as Kraft-san.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Oooh～……R-roger!! Lookin' forward to it!!

Let's make parallel running with Kraft our main focus! 
Think hard about your stamina reserves and when to press the attack.

Let's make parallel running with Kraft our main focus! 
Think hard about your stamina reserves and when to press the attack.

Especially when it comes to your biggest rival at 
the 『Oaks』, Kawakami Princess. Just like Kraft, 
she's the type that excels at longer sustained spurts.
choice_data_list: Surpassing that will be the true battle!

text_block_list.text:
Especially when it comes to your biggest rival at 
the 『Oaks』, Kawakami Princess. Just like Kraft, 
she's the type that excels at longer sustained spurts.
choice_data_list: Surpassing that will be the true battle!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Hii～ Haaaa～……R-rogerrrrrrーーー!!

——Alright, that's it for today's retrospective. 
I was also planning on going over what our 
opponents might do during Pandora's 『Oaks』 but……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
T-Trainer-san, I apologize for her! 
Pandora-san looks like she might be at her limit……!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Funyaa～～～……Howehehe……
choice_data_list: Kraft, please take her back to the dorms
Kraft, please take her back to the dorms

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Understood……! Pandora-san, this way! Lean on my shoulder, 
just like that! Let's go～ One-two～……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Geez……it really does feel like it's the 
『Hardest she's ever worked in her life』 doesn't it?

Her first desire. Her first true effort. 
But slowly that effort would add-up as the days passed——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Huuu～～～…………Alright! 
I can do it. ……Yeah, I can do it!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Ku-chan-senpai. ——I'm gonna win.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Just watch. ……I'll win for sure!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Now, today's main race, the 『Oaks』 will begin shortly. 
Amongst the participating Uma Musume, the center 
of attention is, the currently undefeated——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Oh. ……Kawakami-senpai～, heyo～. It's your first G1 and you're 
quite the attention-grabber. Are you feeling a little nervous?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ara, Pandora-san! Fufuu, thank you for your concern. 
……However, I'm completely fine.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Because today, I've come to claim it. 
My—Princess Tiara!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
A Princess! Noble, captivating, powerful!! 
Every single one of you will be blown away!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Aahaha.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Now you've said it——!
